title: Bad Idea: Immunity for Jeffrey Clark?
description:
In this special edition of The Bureau, Frank Figliuzzi shares why he's concerned that the January 6 Select Committee may be considering "use immunity" for former DOJ official Jeffrey Clark, one of the architects of attempts to overturn the 2020 election.
Follow Frank on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/FrankFigliuzzi1
